tr.td: HVC-RA neurons and a global inhibitory unit representing the pool of HVC interneurons
Heterosynaptic competition combined with spike-time-dependent plasticity
Either Leaky integrate-and-fire (LIF) neurons or single-compartment conductance based (HH, for Hodgkin-Huxley like) neurons.
1-dimensional, homogenous, excitatory chain of nonbursting neurons
HVC-RA and HVC interneurons using single compartment Hodgkin-Huxley neurons.
Burst was initiated with a 3-4ms DC current pulse into 50% of HVC-RA neurons.
Two-compartment model of HVC-RA neurons, minimal conductance-based model
Burst propagation was initiated by stimulating eight spikes in neurons in the first group of the chain, via current injection lasting 10ms.
